title: 820-3437 fan turn on immediately full
message: I have a MacBook Air 13 820-3437 board that had 3 beep ram error. After reflow of the ram , now cpu gets hot but doesn't chime. When I plus in charger to board it doesn't do common on/off cycles before chime but it start immediately with full speed fan.    Cpu gets hot but no chime?   What could be? What should I measure in this case?  Thanks you in advance

title: 820-3437 fan turn on immediately full
message: Bad RAM, CPU or cracked traces. 3 beep air boards are pretty much trash.
